channel.title: Just Paid for Minecraft, need some help
channel.description:
yo guys
i just paid for minecraft and atm i do it on localhost
but the problem is that the map is in snow, i dont like that so how can i make it normal.
second how can i make new world cuz i dont like this world, its not like offline that u can make more worlds now i only have this 1 world :s
thats all if someone can tell me ;)

item.title: Just Paid for Minecraft, need some help
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Remove the map from the server and then restart the server and itll generate a new map.

Btw if you want epic landbridges and an Avatar-Like environment, use this seed:

Read full topic
